text: At the start of your Buy phase, you may discard an Action card. If you do, take '''{{VP|2}}''' from here. — Setup: Put '''{{VP|6}}''' here per player.

name: Bandit Fort
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|-2}}''' for each Silver and each Gold you have.

name: Basilica
text: When you buy a card, if you have {{Cost|2}} or more left, take '''{{VP|2}}''' from here.<hr>Setup: Put '''{{VP|6}}''' here per player.

name: Battlefield
text: When you gain a Victory card, take '''{{VP|2}}''' from here.<hr>Setup: Put '''{{VP|6}}''' here per player.

name: Baths
text: When you end your turn without having gained a card, take '''{{VP|2}}''' from here.<hr>Setup: Put '''{{VP|6}}''' here per player.

name: Colonnade
text:
When you buy an Action card, if you have a copy of it in play, take '''{{VP|2}}''' from here.
Setup: Put '''{{VP|6}}''' here per player.

name: Defiled Shrine
text: When you gain an Action, move '''{{VP|1}}''' from its pile to this. When you buy a Curse, take the '''{{VP|}}''' from this.<hr>Setup: Put '''{{VP|2}}''' on each non-Gathering Action Supply pile.

name: Fountain
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|15}}''' if you have at least 10 Coppers.

name: Keep
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|5}}''' per differently named Treasure you have, that you have more copies of than each other player, or tied for most.

name: Labyrinth
text: When you gain a 2nd card in one of your turns, take '''{{VP|2}}''' from here.<hr>Setup: Put '''{{VP|6}}''' here per player.

name: Mountain Pass
text: When you are the first player to gain a Province, after that turn, each player bids once, up to {{Debt|40}}, ending with you. High bidder gets '''+{{VP|8}}''' and takes the {{Debt}} they bid.

name: Museum
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|2}}''' per differently named card you have.

name: Obelisk
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|2}}''' per card you have from the chosen pile.<hr>Setup: Choose a random Action Supply pile.

name: Orchard
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|4}}''' per differently named Action card you have 3 or more copies of.

name: Palace
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|3}}''' per set you have of Copper - Silver - Gold.

name: Tomb
text: When you trash a card, '''+{{VP|1}}'''.

name: Tower
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|1}}''' per non-Victory card you have from an empty Supply pile.

name: Triumphal Arch
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|3}}''' per copy you have of the 2nd most common Action card among your cards (if it’s a tie, count either).

name: Wall
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|-1}}''' per card you have after the first 15.

name: Wolf Den
text: When scoring, '''{{VP|-3}}''' per card you have exactly one copy of.

name: Druid
text:
'''+1 Buy'''
Receive one of the set-aside Boons (leaving it there).
Setup: Set aside the top 3 Boons face up.

name: Faithful Hound
text: '''+2 Cards'''<hr>When you discard this other than during Clean-up, you may set it aside, and put it into your hand at end of turn.

name: Guardian
text: Until your next turn, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you. At the start of your next turn, +{{Cost|1}}.<hr>This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).

name: Monastery
text: For each card you've gained this turn, you may trash a card from your hand or a Copper you have in play.

name: Pixie
text:
'''+1 Card'''
'''+1 Action'''
Discard the top Boon. You may trash this to receive that Boon twice.
''Heirloom: Goat''

name: Tracker
text:
'''+{{Cost|1}}'''
Receive a Boon.
While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card onto your deck.
''Heirloom: Pouch''

name: Changeling
text: Trash this. Gain a copy of a card you have in play.<hr>In games using this, when you gain a card costing {{Cost|3}} or more, you may exchange it for a Changeling.

name: Fool
text:
If you aren't the player with Lost in the Woods, take it, take 3 Boons, and receive the Boons in any order.
''Heirloom: Lucky Coin''

name: Ghost Town
text: At the start of your next turn, '''+1 Card''' and '''+1 Action'''.<hr>This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).

name: Leprechaun
text: Gain a Gold. If you have exactly 7 cards in play, gain a Wish from its pile. Otherwise, receive a Hex.

name: Night Watchman
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, discard any number, and put the rest back in any order.<hr>This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).

name: Secret Cave
text:
'''+1 Card'''
'''+1 Action'''
You may discard 3 cards. If you did, then at the start of your next turn, +{{Cost|3}}.
''Heirloom: Magic Lamp''

name: Bard
text:
+{{Cost|2}}
Receive a Boon.

name: Blessed Village
text:
'''+1 Card'''
'''+2 Actions'''
When you gain this, take a Boon. Receive it now or at the start of your next turn.

name: Cemetery
text:
'''{{VP|2|l}}'''
When you gain this, trash up to 4 cards from your hand.
''Heirloom: Haunted Mirror''

name: Conclave
text:
+{{Cost|2}}
You may play an action card from your hand that you don't have a copy of in play. If you do, '''+1 Action'''.

name: Devil's Workshop
text:
If the number of cards you've gained this turn is:
2+, gain an Imp from its pile;
1, gain a card costing up to {{Cost|4}};
0, gain a Gold.

name: Exorcist
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a cheaper Spirit from one of the Spirit piles.

name: Necromancer
text: Play a face up, non-Duration Action card from the trash, leaving it there and turning it face down for the turn.<hr>Setup: Put the 3 Zombies into the trash.

name: Shepherd
text:
'''+1 Action'''
Discard any number of Victory cards, revealing them. '''+2 Cards''' per card discarded.
''Heirloom: Pasture''

name: Skulk
text:
'''+1 Buy'''
Each other player receives the next Hex.
When you gain this, gain a Gold.

name: Cobbler
text: At the start of your next turn, gain a card to your hand costing up to {{Cost|4}}.

name: Crypt
text: Set aside any number of Treasures you have in play, face down (under this). While any remain, at the start of each of your turns, put one of them into your hand.

name: Cursed Village
text:
'''+2 Actions'''
Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.
When you gain this, receive a Hex.

name: Den of Sin
text: At the start of your next turn, '''+2 Cards'''.<hr>This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).

name: Idol
text:
{{Cost|2|l}}
When you play this, if you then have an odd number of Idols in play, receive a Boon; if an even number, each other player gains a Curse.

name: Pooka
text:
You may trash a Treasure other than Cursed Gold from your hand, for '''+4 Cards'''.
''Heirloom: Cursed Gold''

name: Sacred Grove
text:
'''+1 Buy'''
'''+{{Cost|3}}'''
Receive a Boon. If it doesn't give +{{Cost|1}}, each other player may receive it.

name: Tormentor
text:
+{{Cost|2}}
If you have no other cards in play, gain an Imp from its pile. Otherwise, each other player receives the next Hex.

name: Tragic Hero
text:
'''+3 Cards'''
'''+1 Buy'''
If you have 8 or more cards in hand (after drawing), trash this and gain a Treasure.

name: Vampire
text:
Each other player receives the next Hex.
Gain a card costing up to {{Cost|5}} other than a Vampire. Exchange this for a Bat.

name: Werewolf
text: If it's your Night phase, each other player receives the next Hex. Otherwise, '''+3 Cards'''.

name: Raider
text:
Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of a card you have in play (or reveals they can't).
At the start of your next turn, +{{Cost|3}}.

name: Will-o'-Wisp
text:
'''+1 Card'''
'''+1 Action'''
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it costs {{Cost|2}} or less, put it into your hand.
''(This is not in the Supply.)''

name: Wish
text:
'''+1 Action'''
Return this to its pile. If you did, gain a card to your hand costing up to {{Cost|6}}.
''(This is not in the Supply.)''

name: Bat
text:
Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. If you trashed at least one, exchange this for a Vampire.
''(This is not in the Supply.)''

name: Imp
text:
'''+2 Cards'''
You may play an Action card from your hand that you don't have a copy of in play.
''(This is not in the Supply.)''

name: Ghost
text:
Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal an Action. Discard the other cards and set aside the Action. At the start of your next turn, play it twice.
''(This is not in the Supply.)''

name: Zombie Apprentice
text: You may trash an Action card from your hand for '''+3 Cards''' and '''+1 Action'''.

name: Zombie Mason
text: Trash the top card of your deck. You may gain a card costing up to {{Cost|1}} more than it.

name: Zombie Spy
text:
'''+1 Card'''
'''+1 Action'''
Look at the top card of your deck. Discard it or put it back.

name: Haunted Mirror
text: {{Cost|1|l}}<hr>When you trash this, you may discard an Action card, to gain a Ghost from its pile.

name: Magic Lamp
text:
{{Cost|1|l}}
When you play this, if there are at least 6 cards that you have exactly 1 copy of in play, trash this. If you do, gain 3 Wishes from their pile.

name: Goat
text:
{{Cost|1|l}}
When you play this, you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Pasture
text: {{Cost|1|l}}<hr>Worth '''{{VP|1}}''' per Estate you have.

name: Cursed Gold
text:
{{Cost|3|l}}
When you play this, gain a Curse.

name: Lucky Coin
text:
{{Cost|1|l}}
When you play this, gain a Silver.

name: The Earth's Gift
text: You may discard a Treasure to gain a card costing up to {{Cost|4}}.

name: The Field's Gift
text:
'''+1 Action'''
'''+{{Cost|1}}'''
''(Keep this until Clean-up.)''

name: The Flame's Gift
text: You may trash a card from your hand.

name: The Forest's Gift
text:
'''+1 Buy'''
'''+{{Cost|1}}'''
''(Keep this until Clean-up.)''

name: The Moon's Gift
text: Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.

name: The Mountain's Gift
text: Gain a Silver.

name: The River's Gift
text:
'''+1 Card''' at the end of this turn.
''(Keep this until Clean-up.)''

name: The Sky's Gift
text: You may discard 3 cards to gain a Gold.

name: The Sun's Gift
text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them and put the rest back in any order.

name: The Swamp's Gift
text: Gain a Will-o'-Wisp from its pile.

name: The Wind's Gift
text:
'''+2 Cards'''
Discard 2 cards.

name: Bad Omens
text: Put your deck into your discard pile. Look through it and put 2 Coppers from it onto your deck (or reveal you can't).

name: Delusion
text: If you don't have Deluded or Envious, take Deluded.

name: Envy
text: If you don't have Deluded or Envious, take Envious.

name: Famine
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Discard the Actions. Shuffle the rest into your deck.

name: Fear
text: If you have at least 5 cards in hand, discard an Action or Treasure (or reveal you can't).

name: Greed
text: Gain a Copper onto your deck.

name: Haunting
text: If you have at least 4 cards in hand, put one of them onto your deck.

name: Locusts
text: Trash the top card of your deck. If it's Copper or Estate, gain a Curse. Otherwise, gain a cheaper card that shares a type with it.

name: Misery
text: If this is your first Misery this game, take Miserable. Otherwise, flip it over to Twice Miserable.

name: Plague
text: Gain a Curse to your hand.

name: Poverty
text: Discard down to 3 cards in hand.

name: War
text: Reveal cards from your deck until revealing one costing {{Cost|3}} or {{Cost|4}}. Trash it and discard the rest.

name: Deluded
text: At the start of your Buy phase, return this, and you can't buy Actions this turn.

name: Envious
text: At the start of your Buy phase, return this, and Silver and Gold make {{Cost|1}} this turn.

name: Lost in the Woods
text: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card to receive a Boon.

name: Border Guard
text:
'''+1 Action'''
Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and discard the other. If both were Actions, take the Lantern or Horn.

name: Ducat
text:
'''+1 Coffers'''
'''+1 Buy'''
When you gain this, you may trash a Copper from your hand.

name: Lackeys
text: '''+2 Cards'''<hr>When you gain this, '''+2 Villagers'''.

name: Acting Troupe
text:
'''+4 Villagers'''
Trash this.

name: Cargo Ship
text:
+{{Cost|2}}
Once this turn, when you gain a card, you may set it aside face up (on this). At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

name: Experiment
text:
'''+2 Cards'''
'''+1 Action'''
Return this to the Supply.
When you gain this, gain another Experiment (that doesn't come with another).

name: Improve
text:
+{{Cost|2}}
At the start of Clean-up, you may trash an Action card you would discard from play this turn, to gain a card costing exactly {{Cost|1}} more than it.

name: Flag Bearer
text: +{{Cost|2}}<hr>When you gain or trash this, take the Flag.

name: Hideout
text:
'''+1 Card'''
'''+2 Actions'''
Trash a card from your hand. If it's a Victory card, gain a Curse.

name: Inventor
text: Gain a card costing up to {{Cost|4}}, then cards cost {{Cost|1}} less this turn (but not less than {{Cost|0}}).

name: Mountain Village
text:
'''+2 Actions'''
Look through your discard pile and put a card from it into your hand; if you can't, '''+1 Card'''.

name: Patron
text:
'''+1 Villager'''
'''+{{Cost|2}}'''
When something causes you to reveal this (using the word "reveal"), '''+1 Coffers'''.

name: Priest
text:
+{{Cost|2}}
Trash a card from your hand. For the rest of this turn, when you trash a card, +{{Cost|2}}.

name: Research
text:
'''+1 Action'''
Trash a card from your hand. Per {{Cost|1}} it costs, set aside a card from your deck face down (on this). At the start of your next turn, put those cards into your hand.

name: Silk Merchant
text:
'''+2 Cards'''
'''+1 Buy'''
When you gain or trash this, '''+1 Coffers''' and '''+1 Villager'''.

name: Old Witch
text:
'''+3 Cards'''
Each other player gains a Curse and may trash a Curse from their hand.

name: Recruiter
text:
'''+2 Cards'''
Trash a card from your hand. '''+1 Villager''' per {{Cost|1}} it costs.

name: Scepter
text: When you play this, choose one: +{{Cost|2}}; or replay an Action card you played this turn that's still in play.

name: Scholar
text: Discard your hand. '''+7 Cards'''.

name: Sculptor
text: Gain a card to your hand costing up to {{Cost|4}}. If it's a Treasure, '''+1 Villager'''.

name: Seer
text:
'''+1 Card'''
'''+1 Action'''
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the ones costing from {{Cost|2}} to {{Cost|4}} into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.

name: Spices
text:
{{Cost|2|l}}
'''+1 Buy'''
When you gain this, '''+2 Coffers'''.

name: Swashbuckler
text:
'''+3 Cards'''
If your discard pile has any cards in it: '''+1 Coffers''', then if you have at least 4 Coffers tokens, take the Treasure Chest.

name: Treasurer
text:
+{{Cost|3}}
Choose one: Trash a Treasure from your hand; or gain a Treasure from the trash to your hand; or take the Key.

name: Villain
text:
'''+2 Coffers'''
Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards one costing {{Cost|2}} or more (or reveals they can't).

name: Flag
text: When drawing your hand, '''+1 Card'''.

name: Horn
text: Once per turn, when you discard a Border Guard from play, you may put it onto your deck.

name: Key
text: At the start of your turn, +{{Cost|1}}.

name: Lantern
text: Your Border Guards reveal 3 cards and discard 2. (It takes all 3 being Actions to take the Horn.)

name: Treasure Chest
text: At the start of your Buy phase, gain a Gold.

name: Cathedral
text: At the start of your turn, trash a card from your hand.

name: City Gate
text: At the start of your turn, '''+1 Card''', then put a card from your hand onto your deck.

name: Pageant
text: At the end of your Buy Phase, you may pay {{Cost|1}} for '''+1 Coffers'''.

name: Sewers
text: When you trash a card other than with this, you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Star Chart
text: When you shuffle, you may pick one of the cards to go on top.

name: Exploration
text: At the end of your Buy Phase, if you didn't buy any cards, '''+1 Coffers''' and '''+1 Villager'''.

name: Fair
text: At the start of your turn, '''+1 Buy'''.

name: Silos
text: At the start of your turn, discard any number of Coppers, revealed, and draw that many cards.

name: Sinister Plot
text: At the start of your turn, add a token here, or remove your tokens here for '''+1 Card''' each.

name: Academy
text: When you gain an Action card, '''+1 Villager'''.

name: Capitalism
text: During your turns, Actions with +{{Cost|}} amounts in their text are also Treasures.

name: Fleet
text: After the game ends, there's an extra round of turns just for players with this.

name: Guildhall
text: When you gain a Treasure, '''+1 Coffers'''.

name: Piazza
text: At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Action, play it.

name: Road Network
text: When another player gains a Victory card, '''+1 Card'''.

name: Barracks
text: At the start of your turn, '''+1 Action'''.

name: Crop Rotation
text: At the start of your turn, you may discard a Victory card for '''+2 Cards'''.

name: Innovation
text: The first time you gain an Action card in each of your turns, you may set it aside. If you do, play it.

name: Canal
text: During your turns, cards cost {{Cost|1}} less, but not less than {{Cost|0}}.

name: Citadel
text: The first time you play an Action card during each of your turns, play it again afterward.

name: Black Market
text:
+{{Cost|2}}
Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. Play any number of Treasures from your hand. You may buy one of the revealed cards. Put the rest on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order.
Setup: Make a Black Market deck out of different unused Kingdom cards.

name: Dismantle
text: Trash a card from your hand. If it costs {{Cost|1}} or more, gain a cheaper card and a Gold.

name: Envoy
text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one. Discard that one and put the rest into your hand.

name: Sauna
text:
'''+1 Card'''
'''+1 Action'''
You may play an Avanto from your hand.
While this is in play, when you play a Silver, you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Walled Village
text:
'''+1 Card'''
'''+2 Actions'''
At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this onto your deck.

name: Avanto
text:
'''+3 Cards'''
You may play an Sauna from your hand.

name: Governor
text:
'''+1 Action'''
Choose one; you get the version in parentheses: '''+1 (+3) Cards'''; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from their hand and gain a card costing exactly {{Cost|1}} ({{Cost|2}}) more.

name: Stash
text:
{{Cost|2|l}}
When shuffling, you may look through your remaining deck, and may put this anywhere in the shuffled cards.

name: Summon
text: Gain an Action card costing up to {{Cost|4}}. Set it aside. If you did, then at the start of your next turn, play it.

name: Prince
text: You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to {{Cost|4}}. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if you fail to set it aside on a turn you play it.)
